title: Wizards, One Rings and Lies with Adrian the Flavian
description:
I speak with Adrian Malyon (or Adrian the Flavian as he is better know by his discord name) on the symbolism of Magic. Adrian is very active on the Symbolic World (Jonathan Pageau) Facebook group and has began writing a series in a reconstructive symbolic look at magic in narrative. There is so much to this conversation, it is quite heavy but good if you can find a quite place to watch and contemplate

Listen to the Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Wizards--One-Rings-and-Lies-with-Adrian-the-Flavian-emain6

Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
